top.title: A 10-year-old, two rabbis and a Holocaust survivor - Who are the Bondi shooting victims?
top.summary: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.

top.title: Hollywood director Rob Reiner and wife Michele found dead in LA home
top.summary: He directed classic films including The Princess Bride, This is Spinal Tap and When Harry Met Sally.

top.title: Chile elects far-right José Antonio Kast as next president
top.summary: Many believe Kast will be the most right-wing president since Augusto Pinochet, who oversaw a 17-year dictatorship in Chile from 1973.

top.title: US TikTok investors in limbo as deal set to be delayed again
top.summary: A deal to sell TikTok has remained elusive, despite earlier claims that a deal was done.

top.title: Amazon pulls AI recap from Fallout TV show after it made several mistakes
top.summary: The errors included getting dialogue wrong and incorrectly claiming a scene was set 100 years earlier than it was.

top.title: Online gaming escaped Australia's social media ban - but critics say it's just as addictive
top.summary: Parents and experts say gaming poses many of the same risks for kids as social media, and want them included.

title.#text: You need to listen to Sudan Archives’ violin opus for the club
Grok is spreading misinformation about the Bondi Beach shooting
